info.name: YouTube - Dark Theme Series - HIDDEN ADS
info.description:
A dark theme I made for YouTube in late 2014 that was supposed to be available on the Chrome store due to the current dark theme being a bit outdated.

* Please check for updates regularly!

GITHUB: https://github.com/depthbomb/YouTube--Dark-Theme-Series
info.additionalInfo:
FEATURES:
- Smooth, dark theme that is easier on the eyes.
- Lighter icons.
- <s>YouTube comment support.</s> Comments are now on the YouTube site itself instead of embedded in an iframe.
- Better ratings bar. (Green for likes, red for dislikes)
- Hides those pesky advertisements. (Can't do anything about the video ads)

---------------------------------

TODO:

- More consistent styles. (Goes with cleanup)
